REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0545 reute r f BC-MEASUREX-<MX>-SELLS-S 03-04 0067

TEXT.TITLE: MEASUREX <MX> SELLS SOUTH AFRICAN UNIT
TEXT.BODY: Measurex Corp said it completed the sale of its Measurex (South Africa Pty) subsidiary to a group of employees who manage the operation. Measurex, a maker of computer integrated manufacturing systems, said the subsidiary represented less than one pct of worldwide revenues and the sale will have no impact on this year's earnings. Reuter
